App::Packer::PAR(3) User Contributed Perl Documentation App::Packer::PAR(3)

NAME

App::Packer::PAR - Pack applications in a single executable file

DESCRIPTION

This module is a modified version of App::Packer, temporarily shipped with PAR until it is merged into newer versions of App::Packer.

SEE ALSO

See App::Packer for the programming interface.

AUTHOR

Code modifications by Edward S. Peschko. This documentation by Audrey Tang.

Based on the work of Mattia Barbon <mbarbon@dsi.unive.it>.
